scripts.client: REACT_APP_DB=$(grep MONGO_DB .env | cut -d '=' -f2) REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version npm start --prefix client
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server " " npm run client"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: REACT_APP_DB=$(grep MONGO_DB .env | cut -d '=' -f2) REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.prod: REACT_APP_DB=$(grep MONGO_DB .env | cut -d '=' -f2) REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version npm run build --prefix client && NODE_ENV=production node backend/server
scripts.test: jest backend && npm run test --prefix client
